name: Distanced (Jet Simon)
description:
Please be patient, the game may take a bit to load :) I recommend not playing on fullscreen.

A short puzzle game about being apart. Instructions are all in game. Levels are all unlocked by default in case you get stuck, but I highly recommend playing through in order.

Thank you for playing,

Jet

Made for Once Upon a Blue Monday: A Sad Game Jam.

Thanks Alex for testing!

Music, Art, and Code are all by me. Some sound effects from freesound.org.

For Ngân
